p: The phenolic content of aerial parts of C. europaea was determined from the calibration curve ( y = 1.575 x + 0.022; R 2 = 0.959). The value was 51.42 ± 0.003 mg gallic acid equivalent/g of extract. Regarding the total flavonoid content ( y = 0.814 x + 0.021; R 2 = 0.953), the value was 20.06 ± 0.007 mg QE/g of extract ( Figure 1). The obtained results in this study showed a significant level of phenolic compounds contained in aerial parts of C. europaea.
